name: Computer Science Engineering
description: The CSE department focuses on software, algorithms and computing.
fullDescription: The Computer Science and Engineering department provides strong foundations in computation, design and software development, preparing students for careers in software industry and research.

name: Information Technology
description: Covers modern IT, web and cloud technologies.
fullDescription: IT department focuses on application development, web technologies, cloud computing and practical implementations.

name: Electronics & Communication Engineering
description: Covers electronics, communication systems and embedded processors.
fullDescription: ECE provides expertise in circuits, signal processing, embedded systems and wireless communications.

name: Mechanical Engineering
description: Designs mechanical systems and manufacturing processes.
fullDescription: Mechanical department focuses on solid mechanics, thermodynamics and CAD/CAM for product design and manufacturing.

name: Civil Engineering
description: Covers structural design, construction and geotechnical engineering.

name: Master of Business Administration
